alert.note: Alert for Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Traill and southeastern Steele Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hope, or 35 miles northeast of Valley City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galesburg, Clifford, Colgate and Roseville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
